body: @matloob I have no opinion about `LabelsFromContext` and I'm not sure I even understand what you are asking.  I am only saying what I said above: the user should be able to manage profiling labels entirely in conjunction with a `context.Context` value.  In particular I am rejecting the suggestion above that the user should be expected to call `runtime/pprof.DoWithLabels` to work with profiling labels.
